m_szDocSumamry: 20+ Nations Have Decoupled GDP From Emissions Since 2000, more than 20 countries have successfully decoupled (both curbed their greenhouse gas emissions and boosted their  gross domestic product ), says World Resources Institute analyst Nate Aden. Aden’s research took off from a recent International Energy Agency report on how energy-related emissions have “decoupled” from economic growth over the last two years.
